titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary reduction of duty on Acetamiprid, whether or not mixed with application adjuvants.
A bill to extend the temporary reduction of duty on Acetamiprid, whether or not mixed with application adjuvants.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to temporarily extend the reduction of duty on Acetamiprid, whether or not mixed with application adjuvants.
